verses.verse: Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%> had finished <S%H8552><s%> crossing <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> for yourselves twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%> from the people, <S%H5971><s%> one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> from each <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> tribe, <S%H7626><s%>

and command <S%H6680><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Take <S%H5375><s%> up for yourselves twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> from here <S%H2088><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from the place <S%H4673><s%> where <S%H4673><s%> the priests' feet <S%H7272><s%> are standing <S%H4673><s%> firm, <S%H3559><s%> and carry <S%H5674><s%> them over <S%H5674><s%> with you, and lay <S%H5117><s%> them down <S%H5117><s%> in the lodging <S%H4411><s%> place <S%H4411><s%> where <S%H834><s%> you will lodge <S%H3885><s%> tonight. <S%H3915><s%>' "

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had appointed <S%H3559><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> from each <S%H376><s%> <S%H259><s%> tribe; <S%H7626><s%>

and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Cross <S%H5674><s%> again <S%H6440><s%> to the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> of you take <S%H7311><s%> up a stone <S%H68><s%> on his shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Let this <S%H2088><s%> be a sign <S%H226><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you, so that when your children <S%H1121><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> later, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'What <S%H4100><s%> do these <S%H428><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> mean to you?'

then you shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Because <S%H834><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> when it crossed <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%>' So these <S%H428><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> "

And thus <S%H3651><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did, <S%H6213><s%> as Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> up twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they carried <S%H5674><s%> them over <S%H5674><s%> with them to the lodging <S%H4411><s%> place, <S%H4411><s%> and put <S%H5117><s%> them down <S%H5117><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> set <S%H6965><s%> up twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at the place <S%H4673><s%> <S%H8478><s%> where <S%H4673><s%> the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> were standing, <S%H4673><s%> and they are there <S%H8033><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

For the priests <S%H3548><s%> who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were standing <S%H5975><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> was completed <S%H8552><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua. <S%H3091><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> hurried <S%H4116><s%> and crossed; <S%H5674><s%>

and it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> had finished <S%H8552><s%> crossing, <S%H5674><s%> that the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half-tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> in battle <S%H2571><s%> array <S%H2571><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to them;

about 40000, equipped <S%H9139><s%> for war, <S%H6635><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> for battle <S%H4421><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to the desert <S%H6160><s%> plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

On that day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> exalted <S%H1431><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> so that they revered <S%H3372><s%> him, just <S%H9201><s%> as they had revered <S%H3372><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life. <S%H9132><s%>
Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%>
"Command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who carry <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> that they come <S%H5927><s%> up from the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Come <S%H5927><s%> up from the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the priests <S%H3548><s%> who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had come <S%H5927><s%> up from the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the priests' feet <S%H7272><s%> were lifted <S%H5423><s%> up to the dry <S%H2724><s%> ground, <S%H2724><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to their place, <S%H4725><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> its banks <S%H1415><s%> as before. <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

Now the people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up from the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> at Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> on the eastern <S%H4217><s%> edge <S%H7097><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And those <S%H428><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had taken <S%H3947><s%> from the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> set <S%H6965><s%> up at Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "When <S%H834><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> their fathers in time <S%H1><s%> to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H4279><s%> 'What <S%H559><s%> are these <S%H4100><s%> stones <S%H428><s%>?'

then you shall inform <S%H3045><s%> your children, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Israel <S%H3478><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> ground. <S%H3004><s%>'

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> dried <S%H3001><s%> up the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you until <S%H5704><s%> you had crossed, <S%H5674><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He dried <S%H3001><s%> up before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> us until <S%H5704><s%> we had crossed; <S%H5674><s%>

that all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is mighty, <S%H2389><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that you may fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> "
